metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8863 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Off-by-one error in the tokenadd function in jv_parse.c in jq allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a long JSON-encoded number, which triggers a heap-based buffer overflow.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8863` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

jq - 1.5+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jq package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1').
